reviewText: Absolutely love this mug! The craftsmanship is incredible and it's the perfect size for my morning coffee. The glaze is beautiful and unique. Highly recommend!
This wall hanging is stunning! It arrived beautifully packaged and looks even better in person. The quality is excellent and it transformed my living room. Worth every penny!
Beautiful bowls with great attention to detail. They're functional and look amazing on my table. Only wish they were slightly larger, but still very happy with the purchase.
